name: Astral Renegades
description:
GameDevTv 2022 Game Jam submission. Theme: Death Is Only The Beginning

You died on a car accident and after you died you wake up in the spirit world and a conspiracy with soul reincarnations is going on. Defeat the demons that want to force you to reincarnate back on Earth and break the eternal cycle of reincarnation.

Genre: Action-Platformer, Metroidvania

Controls (Keyboard):

A - Run left

D - Run right

Space - Jump

M or W - Shoot Phantom Gun (need to get it first at the first corridor!)

Esc - Main Menu

Controls (Xbox One Controller):

A - Jump

Left Stick - Move

Right Bumper (R1) - Shoot Phantom Gun

Start - Main Menu

The game has some animation bugs and placeholder enemies. I did not finish other areas. Thanks for Playing!!!
